attributes.action: make live mean natural life for all murder convictions
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As this government will not back calls for a referendum to re-introduce the death penalty for murderers. Will this government introduce legislation that requires all murderers to serve there full tariff. No parole, but natural live behind bars. Thus stopping people that have murdered from re-entering society and commiting murder again as has happened many times before.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
